Posts.Content: I would like to contact someone who has angiosarcoma and find out how she is being treated.
Posts.Title: Angiosarcoma

Posts.Content: Hi Lisa I had a mastecomy and I am going every 3 mos for cat scans. So far I have been lucky. I was told in my case radiation or chemo is not effective. I wish your daughter well.
Posts.Title: Angiosarcoma
